channel.title: Flawless; Join our IRC! Started on skills
channel.description:
[center][b]Project flawless[/b][/center] [size=15pt]JOIN OUR IRC![/size] [size=20pt][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php?img=0&host=irc.moparisthebest.com&channel=flawless]HERE[/url][/size] [b]Information[/b] I've currently had enough of working for other people and developing their server, I've come to mind that people are just using me for their benefit, therefore I am going to be creating my own private server and hopefully hosting it off a VPS. The server project is legit, I/we will be creating the server even if the development topic dies, although we haven't started the development yet we will be doing so very soon. The server will be based off a very basic, stable and reliable base, we will advance the server to our specifications before we add any little features that the members of project flawless want. We are looking to create a good economy based private server, along with having the VPS, we can work on different worlds for different members fun, we are looking to create the following; [ul][li]World 1 - Includes a economy based private server, shops, skills, combat and more.[/li] [li]World 2 - A great pking server, all round pking.[/li] [li]World 3 - Old school private server.[/li][/ul] If we do come to a conclusion of creating a new world it would possibly be a 508 + HD server, this may not happen though. [b]Character links[/b] All characters will be linked to the worlds, if you log out of world 1 and log into world 2 you will have the same character as all the other worlds, this is a fairly basic feature of saving character files to the C:/ drive. [b]Mini games[/b] The mini games will be based off of the current runescape mini games, we will add something unique to the mini games so people are attracted to out private server a little more. We are currently looking to add the following Mini games first; [ul][li]Fully barrows, this includes the tunnel and reward chest.[/li] [li]Castle wars - We will be sure to add this mini game.[/li] [li]Pest Control - We will be adding this to the server, there will be a lot of fixes such as the portal glitches, NPC spawning and attacking the void knight.[/li] [li]Barbarian assault - Although the map is not added, we have all the interfaces and items ready in the client we are going to use (My client base), Hopefully [b]SWAT[/b] will release his map features soon.[/li][/ul] [b]Teleport[/b] The server will have all runescape teleports, we will not be adding any deltascape like teleports as it will wreck the economy. Same for the mini games, you either walk to the mini game or use a item that teleports you to a specific place. [b]Current development progress[/b] 10% - I have done the first part on my own, I have currently added a few features to the server, such as skills. [i]End of information[/i] [b]Goals and achievements[/b] We have a lot of goals and achievements for this server, our main achievement would be to have a running VPS and trustworthy development members on our team, although most private servers have failed because of their development team doesn't mean our private server will follow their tracks. [b]No one will have a full copy of the private server, this can assure us that the server will not be leeched.[/b] Some of our other goals or achievements would to be out members, we would love the server to hit no.1 one day. [b]Client developers[/b] The client developers will have a inspection before it is posted on any forums, if it does contain a virus/botnet they will be removed from the development team and banned from our server/forums, we would also let Moparscape staff know about this incident. [b]Forum developers[/b] The forum developers will not have access to the control panel in self, although I am starting this server up from no money, and no website, I will have to use a free domain in till I have my paypal set up. [b]Premium status[/b] This is not a server that we hold premium status or give people items for donations, if you are a donor then do not expect for any staff to give you any items, donor means you are giving something to us. [b]Development team[/b] If you would like to join our development team please provide us with the following information; [ul][li]Name[/li] [li]Age[/li] [li]Job wanted[/li] [li]Experiance (We need a lot of proof about your experienced, otherwise you will not be accepted.)[/li] [li]Anything else you would like to say[/li][/ul] [b]Current jobs wanted[/b] [b]Graphical designer[/b] [i]To play a part in this roll you must have good experience in the art of graphics, this includes using programs on the computer. You will be asked frequently to make a new banner, theme or just a signature.[/i] [b]Website developer[/b] [i]You must have experiance in the following forums; SMF, VBulletin. You must also have experience in, Javascript, PHP and HTML, you may be asked to make a new modification for the forums or even make a new website.[/i] [b]Updates[/b] I have been offered a VPS from a respected friend of mine. Thank you [b]_Ikram[/b]. [b]Pictures[/b] I will be adding pictures soon, the base I'm using is Winterlove with high stability, it performes like Rs2d and is a blank server. There is nothing in the process so it will work at 100% speed. [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/omg.png[/img] The CPU rockets to 100% for a few seconds, this is because there was 100 connections going into the server very fast, obviously this wouldn't happen if I wasn't using a AllGoFree bot, as you can see, the cpu goes back to 0 - 3% after the connections have finished. I then tried to hold 500 connections on my server, although I did lag like crazy when the connections where being connected to my server it did cool down a little in the end. For a Winterlove server, this is good; [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/500.png[/img] Here's the computer specs I used to run the 100 players; [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/specs.jpg[/img] [b]IRC Suggestions[/b] After Lin and I was talking about my server over IRC we come up with a few suggestions, here's the conversation that went along about 2 minutes before we decided what not to add.
[17:28] Why don't people reply to modern servers anymore, everyone wants interfaces. [17:28] But i'm affraid I would wreck my server is i put interfaces and hardcoded shit on it. [17:28] no [17:28] dont [17:28] i did that with b2b [17:28] it turned out bad [17:28] make it so you can use mopar [17:28] I wana keep it like basic [17:28] no customs or nothin
I think it was a fairly good idea, to keep a server really basic but advance it with the skills, mini-games and economy would be very good. [b]Servers development updates[/b] [i]07 August 2009 17:33Pm GMT[/i] I have added various different things today, even though the client is not created yet I am using a 317 deob just to configure stuff around the server. [b]Skills[/b] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/crafting.png[/img]Crafting - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/fletching-1.png[/img]Fletching - 20%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/mining.png[/img]Mining - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/smithing.png[/img]Smithing - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/fishing.png[/img]Fishing - 80%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/cooking.png[/img]Cooking - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/firemaking.png[/img]Firemaking - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/woodcutting.png[/img]Woodcutting - 100%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/runecrafting.png[/img]RuneCrafting - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/slayer.png[/img]Slayer - 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/farming.png[/img]Farming -0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/agility.png[/img]Agility- 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/herblore.png[/img]Herblore- 0%[/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/thieving.png[/img]Thieving-50%[/center] [b]Random Pictures[/b] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/mining-1.png[/img] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/fishing-2.png[/img] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/combat-1.png[/img] [b]Pest control[/b] I've also been working on a little mini-game, pest control. Although it's just a little update I will be carrying on with this in a few days when I come back from a school trip. Here's a little snippet of pictures I have for you; [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/pest1.png[/img] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/pest2.png[/img] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/pest3.png[/img]

I will be posting pictures of what I have added to the server soon.

[17:28] <Lin> no [17:28] <Lin> dont [17:28] <Lin> i did that with b2b [17:28] <Lin> it turned out bad [17:28] <Lin> make it so you can use mopar [17:28] <Hextion> I wana keep it like basic [17:28] <Hextion> no customs or nothin

I agreed with you all people like custom things, its going to turn out like RuneScape but then exacly in the wrong way because now they ‘Want’ newer RuneScape tbh right? Also good luck on this and have a nice day.

@boycie-tribey wrote:

* Name: Ollie/Tribey
* Age: 22
* Job wanted: Graphical Designer & Web-Designer
* Experience: Have been using Photoshop for the past 3 years, have managed a very successful forum, which was called TheModerationZone, which was closed due to insuffient money to fund the website. We had over 200,000 members in 4 years of up-time.
* Anything else you would like to say: I have spoken to Aaron, and he has told me I have his vote. I was told I should speak to you, so I posted an application here.
